Articles.Content: OK, I'm feeling lazy today and don't want to search. I finally decided to upgrade 1.2.1 to 1.2.2. I always copy the latest to its own folder before adding mods.  Normally I just start over each time but this time I want to keep my game. Besides my ships what files do I need to copy from 1.2.1 into 1.2.2?

Lazy bones 

Just grab the save file from your old game and pull it across to the new one.  It's in the "saves" folder in your KSP directory.

Of course if you designed ships and ran a modded game, then you could find minor or major issues.  Best practice would be to start fresh and download the mods you previously used again, unless you know for a fact that they haven't updated, or they have auto-update protocols.

Good luck!

SM
